其实地球峰会（ Earth Summit）早于 1992年已经拟就《生物多样性公约》（ Convention on Biological Diversity），获 188个国家承 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the general sense 'top part'): from Old French somete, from som 'top', from Latin summum, neuter of summus 'highest'

entry.def: A summit is a meeting at which the leaders of two or more countries discuss important matters.

example.tran: 在罗马举行的北约峰会

entry.def: The summit of a mountain is the top of it.

example.ex: Snow gleamed on the summit of Mount Simon.

means.word_mean: 1. the highest level or degree attainable;

sentences.sentence: "his landscapes were deemed the acme of beauty"
"the artist's gifts are at their acme"
"...catapulted Einstein to the pinnacle of fame"
"so many highest superlatives achieved by man"

means.word_mean: 2. the top point of a mountain or hill;

sentences.sentence: "the view from the peak was magnificent"
"they clambered to the summit of Monadnock"

means.word_mean: 3. a meeting of heads of governments
1. reach the summit of a mountain;

sentences.sentence: "Many mountaineers go up Mt. Everest but not all summit"
